SEARCH
Package src.syncing

Class DateAndName

java.lang.Object
src.syncing.DateAndName
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DateAndName extends Object implements Serializable
Class that contains the name and the date of a file or a folder. It also contains the type of the file or folder and its path, which are used in some methods.
Implements Serializable to be able to send it through a socket.
Author: Geryes Doumit
See Also:

    • equals

      public Boolean equals(DateAndName document)
      Function to check if two DateAndName objects are equal.
      Compares the type first, then the name and the date if it's a file, and only the name if it's a folder.
      Parameters:
      document - The DateAndName object to compare with.
      Returns:
      True if the two objects are equal, false otherwise.

    • equalLists

      public static Boolean equalLists(List<DateAndName> list1, List<DateAndName> list2)
      Function to check if two lists of DateAndName objects are equal.
      Compares the size of the lists first, then compares each element of the lists.
      Parameters:
      list1 - The first list to compare.
      list2 - The second list to compare.
      Returns:
      True if the two lists are equal, false otherwise.
